testcase.name: getUser_invalidTest2

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path data.first_name doesn't match. Expected: (a collection containing "Michael" and a collection containing "George" and a collection containing "Rache") Actual: <[Michael, Lindsay, Tobias, Byron, George, Rachel]>
